ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of SARAH MARGARET KIRBY of Bedford, Nova Scotia, to be a part-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years.
